name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】SheenderellaDay ⧸ ラストに告知アリ！【#⁠星街すいせい6周年記念LIVE】 [i0vqoGF6xFo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei continues her performance of 'Monster'.
Transition into the next song, 'Requiem' by Kanaria.

subtitles.original: 君が好きなんだ
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: 夜が明けるまで近くにいよう
subtitles.english: Let's stay close until the dawn breaks.

subtitles.original: 僕の記憶が全て消えても
subtitles.english: Even if all my memories were to fade away,

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わったらまた君を探す
subtitles.english: If I'm reborn, I'll look for you again.

subtitles.original: 見かけじゃなくて心を抱いて
subtitles.english: Embracing your heart, not just your appearance,

subtitles.original: 満月の夜君を見つけたモンスター
subtitles.english: On a full moon night, the monster found you.

subtitles.original: 止まらない部屋に這い込む
subtitles.english: Slithering into a room that never stops,

subtitles.original: 足音が徐々に近くなる今動けない
subtitles.english: Footsteps are gradually getting closer, now I can't move.

subtitles.original: このスリル止められない怖がらせたい
subtitles.english: I can't stop this thrill, I want to scare you.

subtitles.original: だけど本当は君が好きなんだ
subtitles.english: But the truth is, I love you.

subtitles.original: 朝が見えるまで隣にいよう
subtitles.english: Let's stay together until morning comes.

subtitles.original: 一万年の愛を叫ぼう
subtitles.english: Let's shout out a love that lasts ten thousand years.

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わってもまた君を探すモンスター
subtitles.english: Even if I'm reborn, the monster will look for you again.

subtitles.original: 12時を少し過ぎる頃月明かり草木眠る頃
subtitles.english: Just a little after midnight, when the moonlight rests upon the sleeping plants,

subtitles.original: 君の涙で僕は目覚める
subtitles.english: I wake up at the sound of your tears.

subtitles.original: 今宵の闇へ君を連れ出す
subtitles.english: I'll take you away into tonight's darkness.

subtitles.original: 僕の記憶が全て消えても
subtitles.english: Even if all my memories were to fade away,

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わったらまた君を探す
subtitles.english: If I'm reborn, I'll look for you again.

subtitles.original: 見かけじゃなくて心を抱いて
subtitles.english: Embracing your heart, not just your appearance,

subtitles.original: 満月の夜君を見つけたモンスター
subtitles.english: On a full moon night, the monster found you.

subtitles.original: モンスター
subtitles.english: Monster

subtitles.original: モンスター
subtitles.english: Monster

subtitles.original: 愛、参り、ディスコミュ まるで狂気の花
subtitles.english: Love, coming, discommu, like a flower of madness

subtitles.original: 泣きそうに、悲しそうに あなたに伝えたい
subtitles.english: Feeling like crying, feeling so sad, I want to tell you

subtitles.original: I only love you それは魔法の言葉
subtitles.english: I only love you, those are the magic words

subtitles.original: 消えそうに、優しそうに あなたに伝えたい
subtitles.english: Faintly, and so tenderly, I want to tell you

subtitles.original: 幸せな蝶になったって 瞬きで宙に飛んじゃって
subtitles.english: Even if I become a happy butterfly, I'll fly into the sky in a blink,

subtitles.original: 並ばぬ願い託して 受けて止めて認めて
subtitles.english: Entrusting my unparalleled wishes, accept them, catch them, and recognize them.

subtitles.original: 揺れるファイヤー叫ぶファイハイ 私染まれば
subtitles.english: Swaying fire, shouting 'fire high', if I am dyed,

subtitles.original: 隣の幸せとか積もる情熱をあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you the happiness beside me and the passion that builds up.

subtitles.original: 揺れるファイヤー叫ぶファイハイ 闇を照らすのだ
subtitles.english: Swaying fire, shouting 'fire high', I will light up the darkness

subtitles.original: イカれた憎しみさえ届く衝撃をくれるか
subtitles.english: Will you give me a shock that reaches even my crazy hatred?

subtitles.original: 独りは耐えうるものね 痛みは愛することね
subtitles.english: Being alone is something that can be endured, and pain is a way of loving,

subtitles.original: 二人は今を生きる どこまで
subtitles.english: The two of us live in the present, no matter how far.

subtitles.original: ファイヤー揺れるファイヤー 二人染まれば
subtitles.english: Fire, swaying fire, if we are both dyed,
